title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman filled in for Rush on Open Line Friday. Clever liars hide context, but EIB provides it. Shannon information theory. Meat processing plant COVID cases. Trump wants to bring back Flynn. #IBelieveBiden is trending on Twitter, but what happened to believing all women? Liberal dogma and the double standards. Trump predicts suicides and AP challenges it. The left is inconsistent when it comes to sexual abuse. The stay-at-home hypocrisy. New Yorkers fleeing the state.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Todd Herman quizzes callers, lays perjury trap. What was Gen. Flynn's actual crime? Jury nullification. FBI needs a cleanup. Bribes, favors, and double dipping are the way of Washington. The elites and Trump Derangement Syndrome. Todd's dad's house of cat pee. Our goal should be a return to normal. Do you feel yourself enslaved? We're killing the economy! Pressure on Gov. Newsom to open California's beaches, especially since studies show that sunlight kills it. Todd's done with Bill Gates. A sexual abuse survivor on why Tara Reade didn't come forward when Biden assaulted her. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush’s show is like a Master Class. We should have been more like Sweden in handling the virus. People are living off credit cards. The American people are taking their rights back. Elective surgeries on hold as doctors and nurses are furloughed. Social media is censoring us. Is COVID just a giant bailout for states that were in trouble? We need CFO Trump in the 2nd term. Caller offers to go back to work for free to save the economy. Pet slugs. Self-imposed misery pushed by the left.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
